47/*
48 * Options.
49 */
50#define CI_ADDRS 1 /* IP Addresses */
51#define CI_COMPRESSTYPE 2 /* Compression Type */
52#define CI_ADDR 3
53
54#define CI_MS_DNS1 129 /* Primary DNS value */
55#define CI_MS_WINS1 130 /* Primary WINS value */
56#define CI_MS_DNS2 131 /* Secondary DNS value */
57#define CI_MS_WINS2 132 /* Secondary WINS value */
58
59#define MAX_STATES 16 /* from slcompress.h */
60
61#define IPCP_VJMODE_OLD 1 /* "old" mode (option # = 0x0037) */
62#define IPCP_VJMODE_RFC1172 2 /* "old-rfc"mode (option # = 0x002d) */
63#define IPCP_VJMODE_RFC1332 3 /* "new-rfc"mode (option # = 0x002d, */
64 /* maxslot and slot number compression) */
65
66#define IPCP_VJ_COMP 0x002d /* current value for VJ compression option*/
67#define IPCP_VJ_COMP_OLD 0x0037 /* "old" (i.e, broken) value for VJ */
68 /* compression option*/
69
70typedef struct ipcp_options {
71 bool neg_addr; /* Negotiate IP Address? */
72 bool old_addrs; /* Use old (IP-Addresses) option? */
73 bool req_addr; /* Ask peer to send IP address? */
74 bool default_route; /* Assign default route through interface? */
75 bool proxy_arp; /* Make proxy ARP entry for peer? */
76 bool neg_vj; /* Van Jacobson Compression? */
77 bool old_vj; /* use old (short) form of VJ option? */
78 bool accept_local; /* accept peer's value for ouraddr */
79 bool accept_remote; /* accept peer's value for hisaddr */
80 bool req_dns1; /* Ask peer to send primary DNS address? */
81 bool req_dns2; /* Ask peer to send secondary DNS address? */
82 int vj_protocol; /* protocol value to use in VJ option */
83 int maxslotindex; /* values for RFC1332 VJ compression neg. */
84 bool cflag;
85 u_int32_t ouraddr, hisaddr; /* Addresses in NETWORK BYTE ORDER */
86 u_int32_t dnsaddr[2]; /* Primary and secondary MS DNS entries */
87 u_int32_t winsaddr[2]; /* Primary and secondary MS WINS entries */
88} ipcp_options;
89
90extern fsm ipcp_fsm[];
91extern ipcp_options ipcp_wantoptions[];
92extern ipcp_options ipcp_gotoptions[];
93extern ipcp_options ipcp_allowoptions[];
94extern ipcp_options ipcp_hisoptions[];
95
96char *ip_ntoa __P((u_int32_t));
97
98extern struct protent ipcp_protent;
99
